Hero.subtitle: Tour Europe ⇄ Morocco
Hero.title: The unifying power of classics
Hero.description: Where passion, elegance and adventure meet — from Europe to Morocco, an unforgettable journey with timeless cars.

About.title: The passion that connects people and classic cars
About.subtitle: At Marocains du Monde Classic Car Club, everything revolves around heritage, craftsmanship, and friendship — a community where every drive tells a story.
About.imageAlt: Classic cars from Marocains du Monde Classic Car Club driving through the desert during a rally

AboutIntro.heading: Beyond driving: discover, taste, connect
AboutIntro.p1: hosts exclusive road rallies across Morocco — from the Atlas Mountains to the Sahara, from the Mediterranean to the Atlantic coast. Not just drives, but full cultural expeditions: landscape, history and hospitality in one experience.
AboutIntro.p2: We blend a passion for classic cars with local gastronomy, craft workshops and special VIP moments — a journey as rich in stories as in kilometers.

Mission.title: Driving with class, connecting with purpose
Mission.subtitle: At MDMCCC, it's about more than just driving — we build bridges between people, cultures, and generations.

impact.title: Social Impact
impact.desc: We create real projects in Morocco — from education and renovations to supporting local craftsmanship. Every event contributes to communities along our route.

heritage.title: Cultural Heritage
heritage.desc: We preserve and celebrate classic cars, craftsmanship, and the stories behind them. Heritage lives when you share it — on the road and with the public.

connection.title: International Connection
connection.desc: We bring together enthusiasts from Europe, North Africa, and beyond. One passion, many cultures — friendships that go beyond the finish line.

Mission.closing: From the streets of Marrakech to the boulevards of Paris — we drive with purpose.

WhatWeDo.title: Passion in motion
WhatWeDo.subtitle: Our activities unite heritage, adventure and connection — every journey tells a story.

rallies.title: Rallies & Tours
rallies.desc: From the Atlas Mountains to the Sahara, from the Alps to the Mediterranean — our annual rallies are more than road trips. They’re cultural expeditions blending passion for classics with local traditions, gastronomy and hospitality.

education.title: Educational Projects
education.desc: We invest in Morocco’s future by supporting schools, organizing workshops and inspiring youth through classic cars — connecting craftsmanship, technology and entrepreneurship.

community.title: Community Events
community.desc: From private gatherings to major international shows — we host events where stories are shared, friendships formed and cultures meet. Music, art, craft and stunning cars take center stage.

WhyClassics.title: Why Classic Cars?
WhyClassics.p1: Classic cars are time capsules on wheels. They tell stories from an era when every detail was hand-crafted and every drive an adventure.
WhyClassics.p2: For the Moroccan diaspora, these cars carry extra meaning: they embody the journey between two worlds — Morocco’s warmth and Europe’s opportunities.
WhyClassics.p3: At MDMCCC, classics aren’t museum pieces. They are living ambassadors of cultural exchange, social engagement and shared passion.
WhyClassics.imageAlt: Classic car during a Sahara rally with Moroccan flag
WhyClassics.caption: Marocains du Monde Classic Car Club — heritage in motion.

History.title: De la passion à un mouvement
History.subtitle: Une histoire grandissante de personnes, de voitures classiques et de voyages porteurs de sens.

2010.title: Première route à travers le Maroc
2010.text: Un petit groupe de passionnés découvre le sud — la naissance de notre communauté.

2015.title: Membres internationaux
2015.text: Le club s’étend en Europe et en Afrique du Nord — des amitiés au-delà des frontières.

2020.title: Club officiel & rallyes annuels
2020.text: Lancement d’événements annuels axés sur le patrimoine, la sécurité et l’hospitalité authentique.

2024.title: Projets sociaux en route
2024.text: Éducation, artisanat et coopération locale deviennent des piliers de chaque édition.

Team.title: L’équipe derrière le volant
Team.lead1: Le MDMCCC est porté par une équipe diverse de passionnés, d’organisateurs, de techniciens et d’entrepreneurs sociaux.
Team.lead2: Des coordinateurs de rallye qui connaissent chaque virage aux mécaniciens qui comprennent chaque moteur — tous roulent avec cœur et sens.

FinalStatement.title: Là où la passion rencontre l’héritage
FinalStatement.subtitle: Chaque trajet raconte une histoire, chaque kilomètre crée du lien. Rejoignez la communauté MDMCCC et roulez avec l’histoire.
FinalStatement.tagline: Marocains du Monde Classic Car Club — Patrimoine en Mouvement

Partners.title: Trusted by the best
Partners.description: Nous collaborons avec les plus grandes marques et organisations de voitures classiques pour rendre votre expérience de rallye inoubliable
